utilities

Interface Observable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ModelAPI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model

    public interface Observable
    Interface implemented by objects who wish to be observed by Observer object instances

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(Observer o)
      Called by Observer objects to subscribe to this Observable object
      void detach(Observer o)
      Called by Observer objects to unsubscribe to this Observable object
      void notifyObservers()
      If internal 'changed' flag is true then will notify all Observers which are subscribed to this Observable object by updating them individually, then resets 'changed' flag to false
      void setChanged()
      Sets an internal 'changed' flag to true

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        void attach(Observer o)
        Called by Observer objects to subscribe to this Observable object
        Parameters:
        o - the Observer object which is subscribing

      • detach

        void detach(Observer o)
        Called by Observer objects to unsubscribe to this Observable object
        Parameters:
        o - the Observer object which is unsubscribing

      • setChanged

        void setChanged()
        Sets an internal 'changed' flag to true

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers()
        If internal 'changed' flag is true then will notify all Observers which are subscribed to this Observable object by updating them individually, then resets 'changed' flag to false
